pr_title: [remoteopenhab] Avoid going OFFLINE when request of items states fails

timeline.message:
[remoteopenhab] Avoid going OFFLINE when request of items states fails

Related to #9281

Signed-off-by: Laurent Garnier <lg.hc@free.fr>

timeline.bodyText: Why would states fail but not the remaining ones?
timeline.author: cpmeister

replies.bodyText:
Look at the related issue. The request is failing if the response size is bigger than 2 MB due to big image data in items.
It is a workaround for OH3 initial release to make the binding usable until I find 1 a way to reproduce the issue and 2 the solution to properly handle this unusual case.
replies.author: lolodomo
